function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UVA, UVB, and UVC rays","Impact":"Skin cell progression, DNA damage, sunburn, skin cancer, and impact on genetic material of microorganisms","Mitigation":"Use of protective clothing, sunscreen, and UV blocking materials","Technologies":"UVGI for disinfection, UV blocking materials","People":"Individuals exposed to UV rays, people in infection control processes","Owner":"Individuals, public health organizations, and environmental protection agencies"}]}
